snippet: Referring Syria to the International Criminal Court might finally rattle the Assad regime.
abstract: Editorial welcomes French-led move to have United Nations Security Council refer Syria to the International Criminal Court for possible prosecution of war crimes; contends move would underscore world's revulsion at atrocities by both sides in conflict and its insistence that those responsible be brought to justice.
lead_paragraph: Referring Syria to the International Criminal Court might finally rattle the Assad regime.

headline.main: A Call for Justice for Syrians
headline.print_headline: A Call for Justice for Syrians

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
